name: Mulberry Scrolls DEMO
description:
Jiang siblings go to the cultivators’ conference in the Unclean Realm. Young Jiang Cheng must establish himself as a worthy Sect Leader and gain respect of the cultivation world. The more respected he is the more say he has in the global matters and his siblings’ future. Will Yunmeng Jiang emerge from the war strong and prosperous and be just that for the years to come? Oh, and Jiang Cheng can attempt to romance one of the prominent bachelors.

Meant to be played on phones. Android only as iOS doesn’t allow manual app installation.

PC version is in the portrait mode just like Android one.

FEATURES to come soon

- Nie Mingjue, Lan Xichen, Lan Wangji and Wei Wuxian are available for romance

- You can dress Jiang Cheng to your liking. Acquire more garments with special bonuses later!

- REPUTATION system: gain respect of the Sect Leaders, gain prosperity for Yunmeng Jiang, unlock new endings

- PATH system: learn from the esteemed Sect Leaders, choose how to approach various tasks

- Multiple endings depending on your romance choice, Path and reputation points

 DEMO here covers the prologue with an dress-up game system we’re really proud of. It was not easy to code it in RenPy but we (Mathew) managed.

DONATIONS are welcome!  https://boosty.to/alexmathew_vn

Also you can follow us and observe the progress on this p@treon-like thingy.
